title: Need a GFX Designer - Free/Minimal Pay
body:
Hi guys,

I am in urgent need of a willing graphics artist that is active and always ready to reply. I need someone to make web graphics and a banner for the site. If you do this for me now, I may pay you for future work. If you wish to receive payment, I can pay, but minimal as I am independent myself.

Cheers

PM me in-game: bollockz
Skype: helloyesiamson
